plot: A telethon for the Alzheimer's Foundation of America, hosted by Al Roker and featuring appearances by Ellen DeGeneres, Hector Elizondo, Natalie Morales, Morgan Freeman, Kris Allen, Wilson Phillips and more.
title: Alzheimer's Foundation of America Together for Care Telethon
